sqlMap.update: update counsel set pTypeNO=#pTypeNO#, mNO=#mNO#, cTitle=#cTitle#,cContent=#cContent#,state=#state# where cNO=#cNO#
update counsel set state='3' where cNO=#cNO#
UPDATE COUNSEL SET cCOUNT = #cCount# + 1 WHERE CNO = #cNO#
sqlMap.select: select cNO,pTypeNO,mNO,cTitle,state,cCount from counsel where mNO LIKE '%'|| #search_name# ||'%' or cTitle LIKE '%'|| #search_name# ||'%'
select cNO,pTypeNO,mNO,cTitle,state,cContent,cCount from counsel where state != '3' order by cNO desc

select cNO,pTypeNO,mNO,cTitle,state,cCount from (select cNO,pTypeNO,mNO,cTitle,state,cCount, rownum rn from (select cNO,pTypeNO,mNO,cTitle,state,cCount from counsel where state != '3' order by cNO desc) ) where rn between #start# and #end#
